---
title: "Getting and cleaning data"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
data = read.csv("SCBH1-2014.csv") #get the csv data
data$st1 = NA #create new column for S(t - 1)
data$st2 = NA #create new column for S(t - 2)

for (i in 2:nrow(data)) 
{
  data$st1[i] = data$SOLR[i-1] #get the hour before solar irradiance
}

for (i in 3:nrow(data)) 
{
  data$st2[i] = data$SOLR[i-2] #get the two hour before solar irradiance
}

data = data[(data$HR >= 10 & data$HR <= 17),] #data for prediction between 10am - 5 pm
data = data[c("MON", "DAY", "YEAR", "HR", "MIN", "SOLR", "st1", "st2")] #necessary columns for prediction
rownames(data) = NULL #remove row names from data frame
View(data) #visualize the data
```

Now the data is ready to build our linear regression model.
